Pumpkin Spice Cheerios is made from real pumpkin puree and a delicious blend of cinnamon, nutmeg, and clove. It’s fall in a box! This seasonal flavor is going to be a pantry staple…but make sure to grab a box as it’s only available for a limited time.

Why They're So Good

  • Gluten-free
  • No artificial flavors and no colors from artificial sources
  • Made with Real Pumpkin Puree
  • 8 grams of sugar
  • 110 calories
  • 17 grams of whole grain per serving

Bee Happy. Bee Healthy.®

You already know that Honey Nut Cheerios®   Naturally Flavored has the irresistible taste of golden honey, making it a family favorite. But did you know that each little "o" also contains soluble fiber from whole grain oats? As part of a heart-healthy* eating plan, eating Honey Nut Cheerios each day can help lower your cholesterol. Made with whole grains and low in fat, Cheerios also provides 12 essential vitamins and minerals. That’s something that everyone can smile about! 

Why They're So Good

  • 12 vitamins & minerals
  • Low fat
  • Good source of calcium
  • Made with whole grain*
  • Gluten-Free
  • Helps reduce the risk of heart disease*
  • Can help lower cholesterol*
  • Excellent source of iron

Buy Now
Nutrition Information

Close

*3 grams of soluble fiber daily from whole grain oat foods, like Honey Nut Cheerios cereal, in a diet low in saturated fat and cholesterol, may reduce the risk of heart disease. Honey Nut Cheerios cereal provides .75 grams per serving.

THE ONE AND ONLY

Cheerios has been a family favorite for years. Its wholesome goodness is perfect for toddlers to adults and everyone in between. Made from whole grain oats, and without artificial flavors or colors, they’re naturally low in fat and cholesterol free. These wholesome little “o’s” have only one gram of sugar!

Why They're So Good

  • 12 Vitamins & Minerals
  • Low Fat
  • Good source of calcium
  • Good source of fiber
  • Made with whole grain*
  • Gluten-Free
  • May reduce the risk of heart disease
  • Can help lower cholesterol**
  • 1g sugar
  • Excellent source of iron
  • Not made with genetically modified ingredients***

Buy Now
Nutrition Information

Close


* All Cheerios cereal varieties have at least 14 grams of whole grain per serving. At least 48 grams recommended daily.
**3 grams of soluble fiber daily from whole grain oat foods, like Cheerios cereal, in a diet low in saturated fat and cholesterol, may reduce the risk of heart disease. Cheerios cereal provides 1 gram per serving.
***Trace amounts of genetically modified (also known as “genetically engineered”) material may be present due to potential cross contact during manufacturing and shipping.

More Grains, Nutrition Packed.

Multi Grain Cheerios delivers the perfectly balanced combination of nutrition and taste with 5 whole grains and essential nutrition to help get you through the day.

Our 5 whole grains are grown, milled, and toasted before being lightly sweetened and enhanced with extra vitamins & minerals, giving you more of the goodness you’re looking for in every spoonful.

Why They're So Good

Eating Multi Grain Cheerios is one simple step you can take towards managing your weight, along with watching your portions and being active.

  • Made with 5 whole grains
  • 100% daily value of 9 vitamins & minerals
  • Good source of fiber, & calcium
  • Excellent source of iron
  • 19g of whole grain per serving
  • May reduce the risk of heart disease*
  • Gluten Free
Buy Now
Nutrition Information

Close

* DIETS LOW IN SATURATED FAT AND CHOLESTEROL MAY REDUCE THE RISK OF HEART DISEASE. MULTI GRAIN CHEERIOS™ CEREAL IS LOW IN FAT (1.5g), SATURATED FAT FREE AND CHOLESTEROL FREE.

So berry good

The goodness of Cheerios, now bursting with the taste of real berries! Very Berry Cheerios is our newest flavor with a blend of strawberries, raspberries, and blueberries, serving just the right amount of sweetness in every bite. With no colors from artificial sources, no artificial flavors, and no high fructose corn syrup, gluten-free Very Berry Cheerios is a bowl of goodness everyone can enjoy.

Why They're So Good

  • 12 vitamins & minerals
  • Low fat
  • Good source of calcium
  • Made with whole grain*

Protein your whole family will love

Fuel your family’s breakfast with new Cheerios Protein. Providing 11g of protein with milk, Cheerios Protein gives you long-lasting energy with a taste your whole family will love.  The toasted whole grain O’s, combined with real cinnamon and crunchy almond granola clusters come together in delicious harmony in two great flavors: Oats & Honey and Cinnamon Almond.  

Why They're So Good

  • 11g of protein with milk 
  • Good source of fiber
  • 27g whole grain*
  • 13 vitamins and minerals
Buy Now
Nutrition Information

Close

* All Cheerios cereal varieties have at least 14 grams of whole grain per serving. At least 48 grams recommended daily.

Go Bananas!

Banana Nut Cheerios are a delicious combination of real banana puree, cinnamon spice and oats, that you and your family are sure to go nuts for.

Why They're So Good

  • Gluten Free 
  • Made with real banana puree 
  • No artificial flavors or colors 
  • 8 grams of sugar per serving 
  • First ingredient is whole grain oats
Nutrition Information

Close

FAQS

Is Banana Nut Cheerios safe for someone with a nut allergy to eat?

No.  Banana Nut Cheerios uses pecan flavoring which contains pecan.  General Mills and Cheerios advise that consumers with nut allergies check with their doctor before trying its products.

Two Flavors. Too Awesome.

Real cocoa and peanut butter…for breakfast? Oh-yeah. Your kids will love the delicious flavor combination and you’ll love that every bite is packed with the whole grain goodness of Cheerios. Now mornings can leave everybody smiling.

Why They're So Good

  • No artificial flavors and no colors from artificial sources
  • Made with real cocoa and real peanut butter
  • 8 grams of sugar
  • 15 grams of whole grain per serving
  • 120 calories per serving
  • 12 vitamins & minerals
Nutrition Information

Close

FAQS

Is it safe for someone with a peanut allergy to eat Chocolate Peanut Butter Cheerios?

No, Chocolate Peanut Butter Cheerios uses real peanut butter, which contain peanuts for flavor. But we want to assure consumers that other Cheerios varieties are safe for those with peanut allergies as General Mills will be adding the peanut butter at a separate facility within their supply chain. There will be clear callouts that the product contains peanut butter on the front of the cereal box and on the side on the nutrition panel, and we will clearly state in name that the product contains peanut butter. Chocolate Peanut Butter Cheerios were also made to look different from other Cheerios products, featuring different color O’s to avoid confusion with other Cheerios products when out of the box. General Mills and Cheerios advise that consumers with peanut allergies check with their doctor before trying its products.

Why They're So Good

  • No artificial flavors and no colors from artificial sources

  • Excellent source of iron
